blogPost.excerpt: Studyum is a pack of custom 3D icons suitable for any fintech product. Create stunning, unique projects with these hand crafted icons, easily editable in Figma, and fully customizable in Cinema 4D. 3D icons rock!
blogPost.body: Studyum is a pack of custom 3D icons suitable for any fintech product. Create stunning, unique projects with these hand crafted icons, easily editable in Figma, and fully customizable in Cinema 4D. 3D icons rock!
blogPost.title: Studyum 3D icons - 28 trendy customizable 3D icons  for any e-learning product
blogPost.author: Andrievskiy Mitya

localize.description: Studyum是一个适用于任何金融科技产品的自定义3D图标包。使用这些手工制作的图标创建令人惊叹的独特项目，在Figma中轻松编辑，并在Cinema 4D中完全自定义。3D图标震撼人心!
localize.tagline: 28个时尚的可定制的3D图标，适用于任何电子学习产品。

localize.description: Studyum是一個適用於任何金融科技產品的自定義3D圖標包。使用這些手工製作的圖標創建令人驚歎的獨特項目，在Figma中輕鬆編輯，並在Cinema 4D中完全自定義。3D圖標震撼人心!
localize.tagline: 28個時尚的可定製的3D圖標，適用於任何電子學習產品。

previous.excerpt: Lack of communication channels on websites results in customer churn, low satisfaction rate and minimal to zero customer success. LiveCaller solves those issues by offering all in one solution, that combines Web Call, Web Chat, Callback, Social Messaging Apps
previous.title: LiveCaller - Free web call with online chat, omni channel and co-browsing

localize.description: 网站缺乏沟通渠道，导致客户流失，满意度低，客户成功率极低甚至为零。LiveCaller通过提供所有的解决方案来解决这些问题，它结合了网络呼叫，网络聊天，回电，社交信息应用。
localize.tagline: 免费网络通话，在线聊天，全频道和共同浏览。

localize.description: 網站缺乏溝通渠道，導致客戶流失，滿意度低，客戶成功率極低甚至爲零。LiveCaller通過提供所有的解決方案來解決這些問題，它結合了網絡呼叫，網絡聊天，回電，社交信息應用。
localize.tagline: 免費網絡通話，在線聊天，全頻道和共同瀏覽。
